tool_description: Validates the accuracy and certification status of gauge block sets used as reference standards in calibration procedures.

block_set_id.description: Unique identifier for the gauge block set

grade_required.description: Required accuracy grade (Grade 0, Grade 1, Grade 2, Grade K, Grade AS)

nominal_sizes.description: List of nominal sizes in millimeters to validate

certificate_check.description: Whether to verify calibration certificate validity

error_messages: Block set not found: The specified block_set_id does not exist in the database.
Insufficient grade accuracy: Block set does not meet the required grade specification.
Expired calibration certificate: Block set calibration has expired and requires recertification.
Missing nominal sizes: One or more requested nominal sizes are not available in this block set.
Invalid grade specification: Use one of [Grade 0, Grade 1, Grade 2, Grade K, Grade AS].
usage: Provide block_set_id, required grade, and list of nominal sizes needed. Tool validates availability, accuracy grade, and certificate status of gauge blocks.

validation_status.description: Overall validation result for the block set

available_sizes.description: Confirmed available nominal sizes in millimeters

actual_grade.description: Actual accuracy grade of the block set

uncertainty_values.description: Measurement uncertainties for each validated size in micrometers
